name: Red Razzberry
overview: NEver heard of a Razzberry who talks and spells? never heard aof a Razzberry who can make sentences? Never heard of a Razzberry who flips for joy every time you pick a correct answer and who corrects mistakes? med Red! He'll ask you to choose words or sentences to appear on his blackboard. Fix the missing words, choose the right letter and have fun with the smartest berry in the bush.
